title: My pixel 3xl isn't suppo eSim QR after upgraded to Android 10 from 9. Previously scan QR code well
content:
I tried with
1. Restart the phone
2.Reboot by long press power button
3.reset network settings
4.factory reset
But nothing work so far
Also OEM also grayed out in developer option
I can't believe all this happened after Android 10 upgrade.
Can Google help with this matter
Or is it resolve if I updated to Android q beta
